title: Bobby Reveals New Wedding Details + Firefighter Featured In Show Segment Calls The Show + Bobby Feud: Things You Only Use Once
itunes:title: Bobby Reveals New Wedding Details + Firefighter Featured In Show Segment Calls The Show + Bobby Feud: Things You Only Use Once
description:
Bobby shares some more updates on his wedding and Amy has some fun wedding facts! We all geek out talking to Fire Chief Robert who called the show after hearing his story during a 'Tell Me Something Good' segment! We talk about Hilary Duff wanting to let her son watch the birth of her daughter…and Lunchbox on why he turned from being against watching his child’s birth. Plus, we played a heated round of the Bobby Feud!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
